camzup.core.Face3

Package Description
camzup.core  

  • Uses of Face3 in camzup.core

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Face3 Mesh3.getFace​(int i, Face3 target)
    Gets a face from the mesh.
    Face3[] Mesh3.getFaces()
    Gets an array of faces from the mesh.

    Gets the next value in the iterator.
    Face3 Face3.rotate​(Quaternion q)
    Rotates this face by a quaternion.
    Face3 Face3.rotateGlobal​(float cosa, float sina, Vec3 axis)
    Rotates all coordinates in the mesh by the sine and cosine of an angle around an arbitrary axis.
    Face3 Face3.rotateGlobal​(float radians, Vec3 axis)
    Rotates all coordinates in the mesh by an angle around an arbitrary axis.
    Face3 Face3.rotateGlobal​(Quaternion q)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by a quaternion.
    Face3 Face3.rotateLocal​(float cosa, float sina, Vec3 axis, Vec3 center)
    Rotates all coordinates in the mesh by the sine and cosine of an angle around an arbitrary axis.
    Face3 Face3.rotateLocal​(float radians, Vec3 axis, Vec3 center)
    Rotates all coordinates in the mesh by an angle around an arbitrary axis.
    Face3 Face3.rotateLocal​(Quaternion q, Vec3 center)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by a quaternion.
    Face3 Face3.rotateXGlobal​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by an angle around the x axis.
    Face3 Face3.rotateXGlobal​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by the sine and cosine of an angle around the x axis.
    Face3 Face3.rotateXLocal​(float cosa, float sina, Vec3 center)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by the sine and cosine of an angle around the x axis.
    Face3 Face3.rotateXLocal​(float radians, Vec3 center)
    Rotates all coordinates in the mesh by an angle around the x axis.
    Face3 Face3.rotateYGlobal​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by an angle around the y axis.
    Face3 Face3.rotateYGlobal​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by the sine and cosine of an angle around the y axis.

    Rotates all coordinates in the face by the sine and cosine of an angle around the y axis.

    Rotates all coordinates in the mesh by an angle around the y axis.
    Face3 Face3.rotateZGlobal​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by an angle around the z axis.
    Face3 Face3.rotateZGlobal​(float cosa, float sina)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by the sine and cosine of an angle around the z axis.
    Face3 Face3.rotateZLocal​(float cosa, float sina, Vec3 center)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by the sine and cosine of an angle around the z axis.
    Face3 Face3.rotateZLocal​(float radians, Vec3 center)
    Rotates all coordinates in the mesh by an angle around the z axis.
    Face3 Face3.scale​(float scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar.
    Face3 Face3.scale​(Vec3 scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar.

    Beware, non-uniform scaling requires that normals be recalculated for correct shading.
    Face3 Face3.scaleGlobal​(float scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's position.
    Face3 Face3.scaleGlobal​(Vec3 scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's position.
    Face3 Face3.scaleLocal​(float scale, Vec3 center)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; subtracts the face's center from each vertex, scales, then adds the center.
    Face3 Face3.scaleLocal​(Vec3 scale, Vec3 center)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; subtracts the face's center from each vertex, scales, then adds the center.

    Beware, non-uniform scaling requires that normals be recalculated for correct shading.
    Face3 Face3.set​(Edge3... edges)
    Sets this face's vertices to refer to those in an array of edges.
    Face3 Face3.set​(Vert3... vertices)
    Sets this face's vertices to refer to a an array of vertices.
    Face3 Face3.transform​(Mat4 m)
    Transforms all coordinates in the face by a matrix.
    Face3 Face3.transform​(Transform3 tr)
    Transforms all coordinates in the face by a transform.
    Face3 Face3.translate​(Vec3 v)
    Translates all coordinates in the face by a vector.
    Face3 Face3.translateGlobal​(Vec3 v)
    Translates all coordinates in a face by a vector; uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's orientation.
    Face3 Face3.translateLocal​(Vec3 v, Handedness handedness)
    Translates the face in local space.
    Methods in camzup.core that return types with arguments of type Face3 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.Iterator<Face3> Mesh3.iterator()
    Returns an iterator for this mesh, which allows its faces to be accessed in an enhanced for-loop.
    Methods in camzup.core with parameters of type Face3 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Vec3 Face3.centerMean​(Face3 face, Vec3 target)
    Finds the center of a face by averaging all the coordinates in its list of vertices.
    int Face3.compareTo​(Face3 face)
    Compares this face to another by hash code.
    static Vec3 Face3.eval​(Face3 face, float step, Vec3 target)
    Finds a point on the face's perimeter given a step in the range [0.0, 1.0] .
    static Curve3 Curve3.fromMeshFace​(Face3 face, Curve3 target)
    Creates a curve from a face in a mesh.
    Face3 Mesh3.getFace​(int i, Face3 target)
    Gets a face from the mesh.
    Face3 Mesh3.Face3Iterator.next​(Face3 target)
    Gets the next value in the iterator.
    static Vec3 Face3.normal​(Face3 face, Vec3 target)
    Finds the normal of a face by averaging all the normals in its list of vertices, then normalizing the average.
    static Quaternion Face3.orientation​(Face3 face, Handedness handedness, Quaternion target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a quaternion based on the face's normal.
    static Transform3 Face3.orientation​(Face3 face, Handedness handedness, Transform3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a transform based on the face's normal.
    static Ray3 Face3.orientation​(Face3 face, Ray3 target)
    Returns the orientation of the vertex as a ray based on the face's normal.
    static float Face3.perimeter​(Face3 face)
    Calculates the perimeter of a face by summing the Euclidean distance between vertices.
    static Vec3[] Face3.sharedCoords​(Face3 a, Face3 b)
    Finds the shared coordinates, if any, between two faces.

    The default constructor.
